about_the_game:
A World on the Brink

Set in the year 2095, 2 years after the devastating Huaxia War, BloodZone: Armageddon plunges you into a dystopian world on the brink of collapse. The remnants of the Huaxia Federation, now known as R.E.A.P.E.R., seek to seize control and impose their tyrannical rule.

As a member of the Vanguard, the last bastion of hope against R.E.A.P.E.R.'s tyranny, you'll fight for the survival of humanity. Engage in intense battles across futuristic cityscapes, abandoned industrial zones, and even the vast expanse of space.

Intense Multiplayer Action

Experience the thrill of combat in a variety of game modes, including:

- Team Deathmatch: Engage in classic team-based combat, where the goal is to eliminate as many enemy players as possible.

- Free for All: A chaotic free-for-all mode where every player is out for themselves.

- Conquest: Capture and hold strategic points on the map to earn points and secure victory.

- Gun Race: Compete against other players to be the first to reach the final checkpoint.

- Destroy: Defend or destroy objectives in a high-stakes battle for survival.

- Capture the Flag: Capture the enemy flag and bring it back to your base to score points.

- Kill Confirmed: Eliminate enemy players and confirm kills by retrieving their dog tags.

- Night Ops: is a thrilling new game mode that immerses players in a world shrouded in darkness. As night falls, the stakes rise. Navigate through treacherous terrain, outmanoeuvre enemies in the shadows, and use your tactical skills to survive the perilous night.


Strategic Gameplay

BloodZone: Armageddon rewards tactical thinking and teamwork. Utilize cover, coordinate with your squad, and outmaneuver your enemies to emerge victorious.

Character Customization

Create your own unique Vanguard soldier and customize their appearance, abilities, and loadout. Choose from a variety of classes, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. As you progress through the game, unlock new weapons, gear, and abilities.

Vehicle Combat

Take control of powerful vehicles and dominate the battlefield. Engage in intense tank battles, race across the city streets in high-speed chases, or battle it out in Tanks in large scale maps!

Clans and Community

Create or join a clan to connect with other players who share your passion for BloodZone. Collaborate with your clanmates to achieve common goals, participate in clan wars, and compete for leaderboard dominance.

Leveling System and Progression

As you play BloodZone: Armageddon, you'll earn experience points that contribute to your character's level progression. Leveling up unlocks new abilities, weapons, and gear, allowing you to customize your character's playstyle and become a more formidable force on the battlefield.

Weapon Arsenal: Access a vast arsenal of weapons, from classic firearms to futuristic energy weapons.

Gear and Equipment: Equip yourself with a variety of gear and equipment to enhance your performance. From orbital drops of ammunition, to grenades and medical supplies, the right gear can make the difference between victory and defeat.

Operator Skins: Personalize your character's appearance with a wide range of operator skins, each with its own unique style and flair.

Progression System: The levelling system encourages continuous improvement and rewards players for their dedication and skill.

A Gripping Narrative

The Huaxia War erupted as a result of a centuries-old rivalry between the two dominant superpowers of the 21st century: the Allied Central and the Huaxia Federation. Tensions escalated over territorial disputes, economic competition, and ideological differences.

The war began with a series of border skirmishes that quickly escalated into a full-scale conflict. Both sides deployed their most advanced weapons and technologies, leading to devastating battles that ravaged entire continents.

The Ongoing Conflict

The war between the Vanguard and R.E.A.P.E.R. continues to rage on. The fate of humanity hangs in the balance as both sides fight for supremacy. The outcome of this conflict will determine the shape of the world for generations to come.

BloodZone: Armageddon offers a thrilling and immersive experience that combines intense action, strategic gameplay, and a captivating narrative. Are you ready to join the fight for humanity's survival?

(All content, including character models, environments, and game mechanics, is our intellectual property.

We have obtained the necessary licenses for any third-party assets used in the game. We are happy to provide copies of these licenses upon request.

If you require any further information or documentation regarding intellectual property, please do not hesitate to contact us.)

legal_notice:
©️ Copyright Notice


All assets used in BloodZone: Armageddon, including models, textures, sounds, and music, belong to their respective owners. Special thanks to Synty, Lovatto Studios, and the talented creators who contributed to this project.

All content, including character models, environments, and game mechanics, is our intellectual property.

We have obtained the necessary licenses to use third-party assets, including those from Synty, Lovatto, and Sketchfab creators. We can provide copies of these licenses upon request.

We assure you that BloodZone: Armageddon does not infringe on the intellectual property rights of any third parties.

Copyright © Grostphere Arts 2024. All rights reserved.
name: BloodZone: Armageddon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Experience the thrill of intense multiplayer combat as you fight for your faction's dominance. Unleash devastating firepower, outmaneuver your opponents, and become a legendary Titan of war for the Vanguard or a Harbinger of R.E.A.P.E.R in this fast paced First Person Shooter!
